lead_paragraph: The two papers have competed for decades in the cities of Tampa and St. Petersburg, Fla. The purchase price was not disclosed.

headline.print_headline: Tampa Bay Times Buys Rival and Begins to Close It Down
headline.main: Tampa Bay Times Buys Rival, Tampa Tribune, and Begins to Close It Down

snippet: The two papers have competed for decades in the cities of Tampa and St. Petersburg, Fla. The purchase price was not disclosed.
abstract: The Tampa Bay Times announces it has bought main competitor The Tampa Tribune from Revolution Capital Group.
